Simulated data with some change (category)

Source: R/data.R
cat_change.Rd

This data has changes from category A to E between two time points.

Usage

cat_change

Format

A data frame with 400 rows and 4 variables

id

The id of the organisation

time

time

gp

Either X or Y

qnt

Quantile group for the two times

Examples

d <- anim_prep_cat(cat_change, id = id, values = qnt,
time = time, color = gp, time_dependent = FALSE)

d_p <- wallaby_plot(d, height = 1)

d_p_anim <- anim_animate(d_p)
#> You can now pass it to gganimate::animate()
